font-family: monospace;">c</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #999900;">+</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #002db3;">+</span></td></tr></table></div></span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><div style="padding-left: 5px; padding-right: 5px;"><table style="border-collapse: collapse; border: 0px; padding-left: 50px; padding-right: 50px;"><tr> <td align="center" style="border: 0px; background-color: #ffcccc"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace;">c</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #999900;">+</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #002db3;">+</span></td></tr></table></div></span></td> <td align="right" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;">7,937</span></td></tr><tr> <th colspan="5" align="right" style="border: 1px solid black;">TOTAL =</th> <td align="right" style="border: 1px solid black;">14,700</td></tr></table><p>The resulting phenotypes are summarized in the table above.</p> <h6>Step-by-Step Instructions</h6><ul> <li>Step 1: Find the row for the Parental Type for all three genes.</li> <li>Step 2: Looking at only your two genes, assign PD, NPD, TT.</li> <li>Step 3: Determine if the two genes are linked.</li> <ul><li>PD &gt;&gt; NPD &rarr; linked; PD &approx; NPD &rarr; unlinked</li></ul> <li>Step 4: Determine the map distance between the two genes.</li> <ul><li>D = &half; (TT + 6 NPD) / total = (3 NPD + &half; TT) / total</li></ul></ul><h5>Determine the distance between the two genes C and T</h5>	A. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(4,626) + 3&times;(160)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">14,700</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">2,313 + 480</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">14,700</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">2,793</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">14,700</td></tr></table> = 0.1900 = <strong>19 cM</strong>	Incorrect	B. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(4,626) + 3&times;(49 + 160)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">14,700</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">2,313 + 627</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">14,700</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">2,940</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">14,700</td></tr></table> = 0.2000 = <strong>20 cM</strong>	Incorrect	C. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(1,902 + 4,626) + 3&times;(26 + 49 + 160)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">14,700</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">3,264 + 705</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">14,700</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">3,969</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">14,700</td></tr></table> = 0.2700 = <strong>27 cM</strong>	Incorrect	D. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(1,902 + 4,626) + 3&times;(26 + 160)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">14,700</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">3,264 + 558</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">14,700</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">3,822</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">14,700</td></tr></table> = 0.2600 = <strong>26 cM</strong>	Correct	E. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(1,902) + 3&times;(26)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">14,700</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">951 + 78</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">14,700</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">1,029</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">14,700</td></tr></table> = 0.0700 = <strong>7 cM</strong>	Incorrect
MC	<p>f166_e149</p> <h5>Unordered Tetrad Three Gene Mapping</h5><p>In this problem, you will use unordered tetrads to determine the between a single pair of genes and calculate the distances between them. The yeast <i>Saccharomyces cerevisiae</i> is used in this study. A cross has been performed to study the linkage relationships among three genes, and the resulting genotypes are summarized in the table below.</p><h6>Characteristics of Recessive Phenotypes</h6><p><ul><li><strong><span style="color: #b34100;">Gene A</span></strong> is analogous to the '<span style="color: #b34100;"><i>amber</i></span>' phenotype. A budding yeast that is homozygous recessive for <span style="color: #b34100;">Gene A</span> cells develop a rich yellow-orange pigmentation, giving the colony a warm, amber hue.</li> <li><strong><span style="color: #4d9900;">Gene K</span></strong> is related to the '<span style="color: #4d9900;"><i>knotted</i></span>' phenotype. A budding yeast that is homozygous recessive for <span style="color: #4d9900;">Gene K</span> cells grow in twisted, coiled shapes, resulting in a knotted or gnarled appearance.</li> <li><strong><span style="color: #004080;">Gene W</span></strong> is connected with the '<span style="color: #004080;"><i>webbed</i></span>' phenotype. A budding yeast that is homozygous recessive for <span style="color: #004080;">Gene W</span> colonies produce delicate, web-like strands that connect neighboring colonies in a cobweb pattern.</li> </ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; border: 2px solid black; width: 400px; height: 220px;"><tr> <th align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;">Set #</th> <th colspan="4" align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;">Tetrad Genotypes</th> <th align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;">Progeny<br/>Count</th></tr><tr> <td align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;">1</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><div style="padding-left: 5px; font-family: monospace; color: #002db3;">+</span></td></tr></table></div></span></td> <td align="right" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;">3,763</span></td></tr><tr> <th colspan="5" align="right" style="border: 1px solid black;">TOTAL =</th> <td align="right" style="border: 1px solid black;">6,600</td></tr></table><p>The resulting phenotypes are summarized in the table above.</p> <h6>Step-by-Step Instructions</h6><ul> <li>Step 1: Find the row for the Parental Type for all three genes.</li> <li>Step 2: Looking at only your two genes, assign PD, NPD, TT.</li> <li>Step 3: Determine if the two genes are linked.</li> <ul><li>PD &gt;&gt; NPD &rarr; linked; PD &approx; NPD &rarr; unlinked</li></ul> <li>Step 4: Determine the map distance between the two genes.</li> <ul><li>D = &half; (TT + 6 NPD) / total = (3 NPD + &half; TT) / total</li></ul></ul><h5>Determine the distance between the two genes A and W</h5>	A. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(1,494) + 3&times;(59)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,600</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">747 + 177</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,600</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">924</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,600</td></tr></table> = 0.1400 = <strong>14 cM</strong>	Incorrect	B. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(1,224) + 3&times;(38)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,600</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">612 + 114</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,600</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">726</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,600</td></tr></table> = 0.1100 = <strong>11 cM</strong>	Incorrect	C. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(1,224 + 1,494) + 3&times;(22 + 38 + 59)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,600</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">1,359 + 357</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,600</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">1,716</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,600</td></tr></table> = 0.2600 = <strong>26 cM</strong>	Incorrect	D. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(1,224) + 3&times;(22 + 38)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,600</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">612 + 180</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,600</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">792</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,600</td></tr></table> = 0.1200 = <strong>12 cM</strong>	Correct	E. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(1,494) + 3&times;(22 + 59)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,600</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">747 + 243</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,600</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">990</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,600</td></tr></table> = 0.1500 = <strong>15 cM</strong>	Incorrect
MC	<p>4d9e_564e</p> <h5>Unordered Tetrad Three Gene Mapping</h5><p>In this problem, you will use unordered tetrads to determine the between a single pair of genes and calculate the distances between them. The yeast <i>Saccharomyces cerevisiae</i> is used in this study. A cross has been performed to study the linkage relationships among three genes, and the resulting genotypes are summarized in the table below.</p><h6>Characteristics of Recessive Phenotypes</h6><p><ul><li><strong><span style="color: #b37100;">Gene B</span></strong> is linked with the '<span style="color: #b37100;"><i>bubbly</i></span>' phenotype. A budding yeast that is homozygous recessive for <span style="color: #b37100;">Gene B</span> produces excessive gas bubbles during growth, causing foamy appearance of the media.</li> <li><strong><span style="color: #076cab;">Gene E</span></strong> is affiliated with the '<span style="color: #076cab;"><i>elephant</i></span>' phenotype. A budding yeast that is homozygous recessive for <span style="color: #076cab;">Gene E</span> cells absorb excessive amounts of liquid, resulting in giant, swollen cells.</li> <li><strong><span style="color: #99004d;">Gene H</span></strong> is linked with the '<span style="color: #99004d;"><i>hairy</i></span>' phenotype. A budding yeast that is homozygous recessive for <span style="color: #99004d;">Gene H</span> cells develop long, thread-like filaments that extend outward, creating a hairy, shaggy texture on the colony.</li> </ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; background-color: #ccd9ff"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace;">h</span></td></tr></table></div></span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><div style="padding-left: 5px; padding-right: 5px;"><table style="border-collapse: collapse; border: 0px; padding-left: 50px; padding-right: 50px;"><tr> <td align="center" style="border: 0px; background-color: #ffcccc"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace;">b</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #999900;">+</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #002db3;">+</span></td></tr></table></div></span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><div style="padding-left: 5px; padding-right: 5px;"><table style="border-collapse: collapse; border: 0px; padding-left: 50px; padding-right: 50px;"><tr> <td align="center" style="border: 0px; background-color: #ffcccc"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace;">b</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #999900;">+</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #002db3;">+</span></td></tr></table></div></span></td> <td align="right" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;">3,004</span></td></tr><tr> <th colspan="5" align="right" style="border: 1px solid black;">TOTAL =</th> <td align="right" style="border: 1px solid black;">6,900</td></tr></table><p>The resulting phenotypes are summarized in the table above.</p> <h6>Step-by-Step Instructions</h6><ul> <li>Step 1: Find the row for the Parental Type for all three genes.</li> <li>Step 2: Looking at only your two genes, assign PD, NPD, TT.</li> <li>Step 3: Determine if the two genes are linked.</li> <ul><li>PD &gt;&gt; NPD &rarr; linked; PD &approx; NPD &rarr; unlinked</li></ul> <li>Step 4: Determine the map distance between the two genes.</li> <ul><li>D = &half; (TT + 6 NPD) / total = (3 NPD + &half; TT) / total</li></ul></ul><h5>Determine the distance between the two genes B and E</h5>	A. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(1,650 + 1,866) + 3&times;(116 + 149)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,900</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">1,758 + 795</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,900</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">2,553</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,900</td></tr></table> = 0.3700 = <strong>37 cM</strong>	Incorrect	B. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(1,650 + 1,866) + 3&times;(115 + 116 + 149)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,900</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">1,758 + 1,140</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,900</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">2,898</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,900</td></tr></table> = 0.4200 = <strong>42 cM</strong>	Incorrect	C. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(1,650) + 3&times;(115 + 116)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,900</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">825 + 693</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,900</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">1,518</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,900</td></tr></table> = 0.2200 = <strong>22 cM</strong>	Correct	D. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(1,650) + 3&times;(116)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,900</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">825 + 348</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,900</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">1,173</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,900</td></tr></table> = 0.1700 = <strong>17 cM</strong>	Incorrect	E. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(1,866) + 3&times;(149)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,900</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">933 + 447</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,900</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">1,380</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,900</td></tr></table> = 0.2000 = <strong>20 cM</strong>	Incorrect
MC	<p>1cd0_c82c</p> <h5>Unordered Tetrad Three Gene Mapping</h5><p>In this problem, you will use unordered tetrads to determine the between a single pair of genes and calculate the distances between them. The yeast <i>Saccharomyces cerevisiae</i> is used in this study. A cross has been performed to study the linkage relationships among three genes, and the resulting genotypes are summarized in the table below.</p><h6>Characteristics of Recessive Phenotypes</h6><p><ul><li><strong><span style="color: #663300;">Gene A</span></strong> is linked with the '<span style="color: #663300;"><i>amber</i></span>' phenotype. A budding yeast that is homozygous recessive for <span style="color: #663300;">Gene A</span> cells develop a rich yellow-orange pigmentation, giving the colony a warm, amber hue.</li> <li><strong><span style="color: #008066;">Gene P</span></strong> is associated with the '<span style="color: #008066;"><i>pebble</i></span>' phenotype. A budding yeast that is homozygous recessive for <span style="color: #008066;">Gene P</span> produces colonies with a rough, uneven surface that resembles a collection of tiny pebbles.</li> <li><strong><span style="color: #800055;">Gene R</span></strong> is linked with the '<span style="color: #800055;"><i>rusty</i></span>' phenotype. A budding yeast that is homozygous recessive for <span style="color: #800055;">Gene R</span> colonies develop a reddish-brown pigmentation, reminiscent of rusted metal.</li> </ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; border: 2px solid black; width: 400px; height: 220px;"><tr> <th align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;">Set #</th> <th colspan="4" align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;">Tetrad Genotypes</th> <th align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;">Progeny<br/>Count</th></tr><tr> <td align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;">1</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><div style="padding-left: 5px; background-color: #ccd9ff"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace;">r</span></td></tr></table></div></span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><div style="padding-left: 5px; padding-right: 5px;"><table style="border-collapse: collapse; border: 0px; padding-left: 50px; padding-right: 50px;"><tr> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #b30000;">+</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px; background-color: #ffffcc"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace;">p</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px; background-color: #ccd9ff"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace;">r</span></td></tr></table></div></span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><div style="padding-left: 5px; padding-right: 5px;"><table style="border-collapse: collapse; border: 0px; padding-left: 50px; padding-right: 50px;"><tr> <td align="center" style="border: 0px; background-color: #ffcccc"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace;">a</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #999900;">+</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #002db3;">+</span></td></tr></table></div></span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><div style="padding-left: 5px; padding-right: 5px;"><table style="border-collapse: collapse; border: 0px; padding-left: 50px; padding-right: 50px;"><tr> <td align="center" style="border: 0px; background-color: #ffcccc"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace;">a</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #999900;">+</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #002db3;">+</span></td></tr></table></div></span></td> <td align="right" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;">11</span></td></tr><tr> <th colspan="5" align="right" style="border: 1px solid black;">TOTAL =</th> <td align="right" style="border: 1px solid black;">6,600</td></tr></table><p>The resulting phenotypes are summarized in the table above.</p> <h6>Step-by-Step Instructions</h6><ul> <li>Step 1: Find the row for the Parental Type for all three genes.</li> <li>Step 2: Looking at only your two genes, assign PD, NPD, TT.</li> <li>Step 3: Determine if the two genes are linked.</li> <ul><li>PD &gt;&gt; NPD &rarr; linked; PD &approx; NPD &rarr; unlinked</li></ul> <li>Step 4: Determine the map distance between the two genes.</li> <ul><li>D = &half; (TT + 6 NPD) / total = (3 NPD + &half; TT) / total</li></ul></ul><h5>Determine the distance between the two genes A and R</h5>	A. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(1,308 + 2,322) + 3&times;(35 + 152)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,600</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">1,815 + 561</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,600</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">2,376</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,600</td></tr></table> = 0.3600 = <strong>36 cM</strong>	Correct	B. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(1,308) + 3&times;(11 + 35)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,600</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">654 + 138</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,600</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">792</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,600</td></tr></table> = 0.1200 = <strong>12 cM</strong>	Incorrect	C. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(1,308 + 2,322) + 3&times;(11)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,600</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">1,815 + 33</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,600</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">1,848</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,600</td></tr></table> = 0.2800 = <strong>28 cM</strong>	Incorrect	D. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(2,322) + 3&times;(11 + 152)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,600</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">1,161 + 489</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,600</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">1,650</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,600</td></tr></table> = 0.2500 = <strong>25 cM</strong>	Incorrect	E. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(2,322) + 3&times;(152)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,600</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">1,161 + 456</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,600</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">1,617</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">6,600</td></tr></table> = 0.2450 = <strong>24.50 cM</strong>	Incorrect
MC	<p>bac9_b219</p> <h5>Unordered Tetrad Three Gene Mapping</h5><p>In this problem, you will use unordered tetrads to determine the between a single pair of genes and calculate the distances between them. The yeast <i>Saccharomyces cerevisiae</i> is used in this study. A cross has been performed to study the linkage relationships among three genes, and the resulting genotypes are summarized in the table below.</p><h6>Characteristics of Recessive Phenotypes</h6><p><ul><li><strong><span style="color: #b30000;">Gene D</span></strong> is correlated with the '<span style="color: #b30000;"><i>doubled</i></span>' phenotype. A budding yeast that is homozygous recessive for <span style="color: #b30000;">Gene D</span> cells display double or multiple budding, with several buds emerging simultaneously.</li> <li><strong><span style="color: #4d9900;">Gene K</span></strong> is affiliated with the '<span style="color: #4d9900;"><i>knotted</i></span>' phenotype. A budding yeast that is homozygous recessive for <span style="color: #4d9900;">Gene K</span> cells grow in twisted, coiled shapes, resulting in a knotted or gnarled appearance.</li> <li><strong><span style="color: #004080;">Gene W</span></strong> is correlated with the '<span style="color: #004080;"><i>webbed</i></span>' phenotype. A budding yeast that is homozygous recessive for <span style="color: #004080;">Gene W</span> colonies produce delicate, web-like strands that connect neighboring colonies in a cobweb pattern.</li> </ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; border: 2px solid black; width: 400px; height: 220px;"><tr> <th align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;">Set #</th> <th colspan="4" align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;">Tetrad Genotypes</th> <th align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;">Progeny<br/>Count</th></tr><tr> <td align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;">1</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><div style="padding-left: 5px; font-family: monospace;">d</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #999900;">+</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #002db3;">+</span></td></tr></table></div></span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><div style="padding-left: 5px; padding-right: 5px;"><table style="border-collapse: collapse; border: 0px; padding-left: 50px; padding-right: 50px;"><tr> <td align="center" style="border: 0px; background-color: #ffcccc"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace;">d</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #999900;">+</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #002db3;">+</span></td></tr></table></div></span></td> <td align="right" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;">20</span></td></tr><tr> <th colspan="5" align="right" style="border: 1px solid black;">TOTAL =</th> <td align="right" style="border: 1px solid black;">4,800</td></tr></table><p>The resulting phenotypes are summarized in the table above.</p> <h6>Step-by-Step Instructions</h6><ul> <li>Step 1: Find the row for the Parental Type for all three genes.</li> <li>Step 2: Looking at only your two genes, assign PD, NPD, TT.</li> <li>Step 3: Determine if the two genes are linked.</li> <ul><li>PD &gt;&gt; NPD &rarr; linked; PD &approx; NPD &rarr; unlinked</li></ul> <li>Step 4: Determine the map distance between the two genes.</li> <ul><li>D = &half; (TT + 6 NPD) / total = (3 NPD + &half; TT) / total</li></ul></ul><h5>Determine the distance between the two genes D and W</h5>	A. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(888 + 1,728) + 3&times;(20 + 104)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">4,800</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">1,308 + 372</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">4,800</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">1,680</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">4,800</td></tr></table> = 0.3500 = <strong>35 cM</strong>	Incorrect	B. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(1,728) + 3&times;(8 + 104)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">4,800</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">864 + 336</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">4,800</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">1,200</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">4,800</td></tr></table> = 0.2500 = <strong>25 cM</strong>	Correct	C. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(888) + 3&times;(20 + 104)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">4,800</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">444 + 372</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">4,800</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">816</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">4,800</td></tr></table> = 0.1700 = <strong>17 cM</strong>	Incorrect	D. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(888) + 3&times;(8 + 20)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">4,800</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">444 + 84</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">4,800</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">528</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">4,800</td></tr></table> = 0.1100 = <strong>11 cM</strong>	Incorrect	E. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(888 + 1,728) + 3&times;(8 + 20)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">4,800</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">1,308 + 84</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">4,800</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">1,392</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">4,800</td></tr></table> = 0.2900 = <strong>29 cM</strong>	Incorrect
MC	<p>97cf_a1df</p> <h5>Unordered Tetrad Three Gene Mapping</h5><p>In this problem, you will use unordered tetrads to determine the between a single pair of genes and calculate the distances between them. The yeast <i>Saccharomyces cerevisiae</i> is used in this study. A cross has been performed to study the linkage relationships among three genes, and the resulting genotypes are summarized in the table below.</p><h6>Characteristics of Recessive Phenotypes</h6><p><ul><li><strong><span style="color: #b34100;">Gene B</span></strong> is linked with the '<span style="color: #b34100;"><i>bubbly</i></span>' phenotype. A budding yeast that is homozygous recessive for <span style="color: #b34100;">Gene B</span> produces excessive gas bubbles during growth, causing foamy appearance of the media.</li> <li><strong><span style="color: #465927;">Gene E</span></strong> is connected with the '<span style="color: #465927;"><i>elephant</i></span>' phenotype. A budding yeast that is homozygous recessive for <span style="color: #465927;">Gene E</span> cells absorb excessive amounts of liquid, resulting in giant, swollen cells.</li> <li><strong><span style="color: #002db3;">Gene F</span></strong> is connected with the '<span style="color: #002db3;"><i>fuzzy</i></span>' phenotype. A budding yeast that is homozygous recessive for <span style="color: #002db3;">Gene F</span> colonies are covered in soft, fine filaments, giving them a fuzzy, cotton-like texture.</li> </ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; border: 2px solid black; width: 400px; height: 220px;"><tr> <th align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;">Set #</th> <th colspan="4" align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;">Tetrad Genotypes</th> <th align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;">Progeny<br/>Count</th></tr><tr> <td align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;">1</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><div style="padding-left: 5px; font-family: monospace;">b</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #999900;">+</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #002db3;">+</span></td></tr></table></div></span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><div style="padding-left: 5px; padding-right: 5px;"><table style="border-collapse: collapse; border: 0px; padding-left: 50px; padding-right: 50px;"><tr> <td align="center" style="border: 0px; background-color: #ffcccc"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace;">b</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #999900;">+</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #002db3;">+</span></td></tr></table></div></span></td> <td align="right" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;">10,440</span></td></tr><tr> <th colspan="5" align="right" style="border: 1px solid black;">TOTAL =</th> <td align="right" style="border: 1px solid black;">24,000</td></tr></table><p>The resulting phenotypes are summarized in the table above.</p> <h6>Step-by-Step Instructions</h6><ul> <li>Step 1: Find the row for the Parental Type for all three genes.</li> <li>Step 2: Looking at only your two genes, assign PD, NPD, TT.</li> <li>Step 3: Determine if the two genes are linked.</li> <ul><li>PD &gt;&gt; NPD &rarr; linked; PD &approx; NPD &rarr; unlinked</li></ul> <li>Step 4: Determine the map distance between the two genes.</li> <ul><li>D = &half; (TT + 6 NPD) / total = (3 NPD + &half; TT) / total</li></ul></ul><h5>Determine the distance between the two genes B and F</h5>	A. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(5,322 + 7,158) + 3&times;(273 + 527)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">24,000</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">6,240 + 2,400</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">24,000</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">8,640</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">24,000</td></tr></table> = 0.3600 = <strong>36 cM</strong>	Incorrect	B. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(5,322 + 7,158) + 3&times;(280)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">24,000</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">6,240 + 840</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">24,000</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">7,080</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">24,000</td></tr></table> = 0.2950 = <strong>29.50 cM</strong>	Incorrect	C. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(7,158) + 3&times;(280 + 527)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">24,000</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">3,579 + 2,421</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">24,000</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">6,000</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">24,000</td></tr></table> = 0.2500 = <strong>25 cM</strong>	Correct	D. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(5,322 + 7,158) + 3&times;(273 + 280 + 527)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">24,000</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">6,240 + 3,240</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">24,000</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">9,480</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">24,000</td></tr></table> = 0.3950 = <strong>39.50 cM</strong>	Incorrect	E. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(5,322) + 3&times;(273 + 280)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">24,000</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">2,661 + 1,659</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">24,000</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">4,320</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">24,000</td></tr></table> = 0.1800 = <strong>18 cM</strong>	Incorrect
MC	<p>2f80_533c</p> <h5>Unordered Tetrad Three Gene Mapping</h5><p>In this problem, you will use unordered tetrads to determine the between a single pair of genes and calculate the distances between them. The yeast <i>Saccharomyces cerevisiae</i> is used in this study. A cross has been performed to study the linkage relationships among three genes, and the resulting genotypes are summarized in the table below.</p><h6>Characteristics of Recessive Phenotypes</h6><p><ul><li><strong><span style="color: #663300;">Gene H</span></strong> is linked with the '<span style="color: #663300;"><i>hairy</i></span>' phenotype. A budding yeast that is homozygous recessive for <span style="color: #663300;">Gene H</span> cells develop long, thread-like filaments that extend outward, creating a hairy, shaggy texture on the colony.</li> <li><strong><span style="color: #008066;">Gene K</span></strong> is correlated with the '<span style="color: #008066;"><i>knotted</i></span>' phenotype. A budding yeast that is homozygous recessive for <span style="color: #008066;">Gene K</span> cells grow in twisted, coiled shapes, resulting in a knotted or gnarled appearance.</li> <li><strong><span style="color: #800055;">Gene W</span></strong> is affiliated with the '<span style="color: #800055;"><i>webbed</i></span>' phenotype. A budding yeast that is homozygous recessive for <span style="color: #800055;">Gene W</span> colonies produce delicate, web-like strands that connect neighboring colonies in a cobweb pattern.</li> </ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; border: 2px solid black; width: 400px; height: 220px;"><tr> <th align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;">Set #</th> <th colspan="4" align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;">Tetrad Genotypes</th> <th align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;">Progeny<br/>Count</th></tr><tr> <td align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;">1</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><div style="padding-left: 5px; font-family: monospace;">h</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #999900;">+</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; padding-right: 5px;"><table style="border-collapse: collapse; border: 0px; padding-left: 50px; padding-right: 50px;"><tr> <td align="center" style="border: 0px; background-color: #ffcccc"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace;">h</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #999900;">+</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #002db3;">+</span></td></tr></table></div></span></td> <td align="right" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;">56</span></td></tr><tr> <th colspan="5" align="right" style="border: 1px solid black;">TOTAL =</th> <td align="right" style="border: 1px solid black;">7,200</td></tr></table><p>The resulting phenotypes are summarized in the table above.</p> <h6>Step-by-Step Instructions</h6><ul> <li>Step 1: Find the row for the Parental Type for all three genes.</li> <li>Step 2: Looking at only your two genes, assign PD, NPD, TT.</li> <li>Step 3: Determine if the two genes are linked.</li> <ul><li>PD &gt;&gt; NPD &rarr; linked; PD &approx; NPD &rarr; unlinked</li></ul> <li>Step 4: Determine the map distance between the two genes.</li> <ul><li>D = &half; (TT + 6 NPD) / total = (3 NPD + &half; TT) / total</li></ul></ul><h5>Determine the distance between the two genes K and W</h5>	A. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(1,464 + 1,920) + 3&times;(56 + 60 + 100)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">7,200</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">1,692 + 648</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">7,200</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">2,340</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">7,200</td></tr></table> = 0.3250 = <strong>32.50 cM</strong>	Incorrect	B. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(1,464) + 3&times;(56 + 60)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">7,200</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">732 + 348</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">7,200</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">1,080</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">7,200</td></tr></table> = 0.1500 = <strong>15 cM</strong>	Incorrect	C. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(1,464 + 1,920) + 3&times;(60)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">7,200</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">1,872</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">7,200</td></tr></table> = 0.2600 = <strong>26 cM</strong>	Incorrect	D. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(1,920) + 3&times;(60 + 100)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">7,200</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">960 + 480</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">7,200</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">1,440</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">7,200</td></tr></table> = 0.2000 = <strong>20 cM</strong>	Incorrect	E. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(1,464 + 1,920) + 3&times;(56 + 100)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">7,200</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">1,692 + 468</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">7,200</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">2,160</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">7,200</td></tr></table> = 0.3000 = <strong>30 cM</strong>	Correct
MC	<p>5475_1ec1</p> <h5>Unordered Tetrad Three Gene Mapping</h5><p>In this problem, you will use unordered tetrads to determine the between a single pair of genes and calculate the distances between them. The yeast <i>Saccharomyces cerevisiae</i> is used in this study. A cross has been performed to study the linkage relationships among three genes, and the resulting genotypes are summarized in the table below.</p><h6>Characteristics of Recessive Phenotypes</h6><p><ul><li><strong><span style="color: #b30000;">Gene D</span></strong> is connected with the '<span style="color: #b30000;"><i>doubled</i></span>' phenotype. A budding yeast that is homozygous recessive for <span style="color: #b30000;">Gene D</span> cells display double or multiple budding, with several buds emerging simultaneously.</li> <li><strong><span style="color: #999900;">Gene R</span></strong> is correlated with the '<span style="color: #999900;"><i>rusty</i></span>' phenotype. A budding yeast that is homozygous recessive for <span style="color: #999900;">Gene R</span> colonies develop a reddish-brown pigmentation, reminiscent of rusted metal.</li> <li><strong><span style="color: #008066;">Gene X</span></strong> is associated with the '<span style="color: #008066;"><i>xenon</i></span>' phenotype. A budding yeast that is homozygous recessive for <span style="color: #008066;">Gene X</span> cells emit a faint glow under UV light, as if they were fluorescent.</li> </ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; NPD &rarr; linked; PD &approx; NPD &rarr; unlinked</li></ul> <li>Step 4: Determine the map distance between the two genes.</li> <ul><li>D = &half; (TT + 6 NPD) / total = (3 NPD + &half; TT) / total</li></ul></ul><h5>Determine the distance between the two genes D and X</h5>	A. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(5,844) + 3&times;(488)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">20,400</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">2,922 + 1,464</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">20,400</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; MC	<p>e0e3_de8b</p> <h5>Unordered Tetrad Three Gene Mapping</h5><p>In this problem, you will use unordered tetrads to determine the between a single pair of genes and calculate the distances between them. The yeast <i>Saccharomyces cerevisiae</i> is used in this study. A cross has been performed to study the linkage relationships among three genes, and the resulting genotypes are summarized in the table below.</p><h6>Characteristics of Recessive Phenotypes</h6><p><ul><li><strong><span style="color: #b37100;">Gene B</span></strong> is analogous to the '<span style="color: #b37100;"><i>bubbly</i></span>' phenotype. A budding yeast that is homozygous recessive for <span style="color: #b37100;">Gene B</span> produces excessive gas bubbles during growth, causing foamy appearance of the media.</li> <li><strong><span style="color: #008080;">Gene C</span></strong> is affiliated with the '<span style="color: #008080;"><i>clumpy</i></span>' phenotype. A budding yeast that is homozygous recessive for <span style="color: #008080;">Gene C</span> grows in dense, irregular clusters, with cells clumping together rather than spreading smoothly.</li> <li><strong><span style="color: #800055;">Gene E</span></strong> is associated with the '<span style="color: #800055;"><i>elephant</i></span>' phenotype. A budding yeast that is homozygous recessive for <span style="color: #800055;">Gene E</span> cells absorb excessive amounts of liquid, resulting in giant, swollen cells.</li> </ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; border: 2px solid black; width: 400px; height: 220px;"><tr> <th align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;">Set #</th> <th colspan="4" align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;">Tetrad Genotypes</th> <th align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;">Progeny<br/>Count</th></tr><tr> <td align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;">1</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><div style="padding-left: 5px; color: #b30000;">+</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px; background-color: #ffffcc"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace;">c</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px; background-color: #ccd9ff"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace;">e</span></td></tr></table></div></span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><div style="padding-left: 5px; padding-right: 5px;"><table style="border-collapse: collapse; border: 0px; padding-left: 50px; padding-right: 50px;"><tr> <td align="center" style="border: 0px; background-color: #ffcccc"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace;">b</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #999900;">+</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #002db3;">+</span></td></tr></table></div></span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><div style="padding-left: 5px; padding-right: 5px;"><table style="border-collapse: collapse; border: 0px; padding-left: 50px; padding-right: 50px;"><tr> <td align="center" style="border: 0px; background-color: #ffcccc"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace;">b</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #999900;">+</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #002db3;">+</span></td></tr></table></div></span></td> <td align="right" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;">117</span></td></tr><tr> <th colspan="5" align="right" style="border: 1px solid black;">TOTAL =</th> <td align="right" style="border: 1px solid black;">14,100</td></tr></table><p>The resulting phenotypes are summarized in the table above.</p> <h6>Step-by-Step Instructions</h6><ul> <li>Step 1: Find the row for the Parental Type for all three genes.</li> <li>Step 2: Looking at only your two genes, assign PD, NPD, TT.</li> <li>Step 3: Determine if the two genes are linked.</li> <ul><li>PD &gt;&gt; NPD &rarr; linked; PD &approx; NPD &rarr; unlinked</li></ul> <li>Step 4: Determine the map distance between the two genes.</li> <ul><li>D = &half; (TT + 6 NPD) / total = (3 NPD + &half; TT) / total</li></ul></ul><h5>Determine the distance between the two genes B and E</h5>	A. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(5,784) + 3&times;(47 + 117)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">14,100</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">2,892 + 492</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">14,100</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">3,384</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">14,100</td></tr></table> = 0.2400 = <strong>24 cM</strong>	Incorrect	B. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(1,098) + 3&times;(5)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">14,100</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">549 + 15</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">14,100</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">564</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">14,100</td></tr></table> = 0.0400 = <strong>4 cM</strong>	Incorrect	C. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(1,098) + 3&times;(5 + 47)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">14,100</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">549 + 156</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">14,100</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">705</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">14,100</td></tr></table> = 0.0500 = <strong>5 cM</strong>	Incorrect	D. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(1,098 + 5,784) + 3&times;(5 + 47 + 117)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">14,100</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">3,441 + 507</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">14,100</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">3,948</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">14,100</td></tr></table> = 0.2800 = <strong>28 cM</strong>	Incorrect	E. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(1,098 + 5,784) + 3&times;(5 + 117)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">14,100</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">3,441 + 366</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">14,100</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">3,807</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">14,100</td></tr></table> = 0.2700 = <strong>27 cM</strong>	Correct
MC	<p>af23_d136</p> <h5>Unordered Tetrad Three Gene Mapping</h5><p>In this problem, you will use unordered tetrads to determine the between a single pair of genes and calculate the distances between them. The yeast <i>Saccharomyces cerevisiae</i> is used in this study. A cross has been performed to study the linkage relationships among three genes, and the resulting genotypes are summarized in the table below.</p><h6>Characteristics of Recessive Phenotypes</h6><p><ul><li><strong><span style="color: #663300;">Gene F</span></strong> is analogous to the '<span style="color: #663300;"><i>fuzzy</i></span>' phenotype. A budding yeast that is homozygous recessive for <span style="color: #663300;">Gene F</span> colonies are covered in soft, fine filaments, giving them a fuzzy, cotton-like texture.</li> <li><strong><span style="color: #4d9900;">Gene T</span></strong> is analogous to the '<span style="color: #4d9900;"><i>toxic</i></span>' phenotype. A budding yeast that is homozygous recessive for <span style="color: #4d9900;">Gene T</span> secretes a toxic compound that inhibits or kills other microbial colonies nearby.</li> <li><strong><span style="color: #004080;">Gene Y</span></strong> is connected with the '<span style="color: #004080;"><i>yolk</i></span>' phenotype. A budding yeast that is homozygous recessive for <span style="color: #004080;">Gene Y</span> cells develop a dense, yellowish core that resembles an egg yolk when viewed under a microscope.</li> </ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; border: 2px solid black; width: 400px; height: 220px;"><tr> <th align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;">Set #</th> <th colspan="4" align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;">Tetrad Genotypes</th> <th align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;">Progeny<br/>Count</th></tr><tr> <td align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;">1</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><div style="padding-left: 5px; padding-right: 5px;"><table style="border-collapse: collapse; border: 0px; padding-left: 50px; padding-right: 50px;"><tr> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #b30000;">+</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #999900;">+</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #002db3;">+</span></td></tr></table></div></span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><div style="padding-left: 5px; background-color: #ccd9ff"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace;">y</span></td></tr></table></div></span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><div style="padding-left: 5px; padding-right: 5px;"><table style="border-collapse: collapse; border: 0px; padding-left: 50px; padding-right: 50px;"><tr> <td align="center" style="border: 0px; background-color: #ffcccc"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace;">f</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #999900;">+</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #002db3;">+</span></td></tr></table></div></span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><div style="padding-left: 5px; padding-right: 5px;"><table style="border-collapse: collapse; border: 0px; padding-left: 50px; padding-right: 50px;"><tr> <td align="center" style="border: 0px; background-color: #ffcccc"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace;">f</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #999900;">+</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #002db3;">+</span></td></tr></table></div></span></td> <td align="right" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;">234</span></td></tr><tr> <th colspan="5" align="right" style="border: 1px solid black;">TOTAL =</th> <td align="right" style="border: 1px solid black;">13,950</td></tr></table><p>The resulting phenotypes are summarized in the table above.</p> <h6>Step-by-Step Instructions</h6><ul> <li>Step 1: Find the row for the Parental Type for all three genes.</li> <li>Step 2: Looking at only your two genes, assign PD, NPD, TT.</li> <li>Step 3: Determine if the two genes are linked.</li> <ul><li>PD &gt;&gt; NPD &rarr; linked; PD &approx; NPD &rarr; unlinked</li></ul> <li>Step 4: Determine the map distance between the two genes.</li> <ul><li>D = &half; (TT + 6 NPD) / total = (3 NPD + &half; TT) / total</li></ul></ul><h5>Determine the distance between the two genes T and Y</h5>	A. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(3,300 + 3,618) + 3&times;(186 + 194 + 234)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">13,950</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">3,459 + 1,842</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">13,950</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">5,301</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">13,950</td></tr></table> = 0.3800 = <strong>38 cM</strong>	Incorrect	B. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(3,618) + 3&times;(234)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">13,950</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">1,809 + 702</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">13,950</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">2,511</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">13,950</td></tr></table> = 0.1800 = <strong>18 cM</strong>	Incorrect	C. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(3,618) + 3&times;(186 + 234)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">13,950</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">3,069</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">13,950</td></tr></table> = 0.2200 = <strong>22 cM</strong>	Correct	D. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(3,300 + 3,618) + 3&times;(194 + 234)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">13,950</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">3,459 + 1,284</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">13,950</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">4,743</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">13,950</td></tr></table> = 0.3400 = <strong>34 cM</strong>	Incorrect	E. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(3,300) + 3&times;(194)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">13,950</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">1,650 + 582</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">13,950</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">2,232</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">13,950</td></tr></table> = 0.1600 = <strong>16 cM</strong>	Incorrect
MC	<p>4e4b_41ce</p> <h5>Unordered Tetrad Three Gene Mapping</h5><p>In this problem, you will use unordered tetrads to determine the between a single pair of genes and calculate the distances between them. The yeast <i>Saccharomyces cerevisiae</i> is used in this study. A cross has been performed to study the linkage relationships among three genes, and the resulting genotypes are summarized in the table below.</p><h6>Characteristics of Recessive Phenotypes</h6><p><ul><li><strong><span style="color: #b30000;">Gene H</span></strong> is associated with the '<span style="color: #b30000;"><i>hairy</i></span>' phenotype. A budding yeast that is homozygous recessive for <span style="color: #b30000;">Gene H</span> cells develop long, thread-like filaments that extend outward, creating a hairy, shaggy texture on the colony.</li> <li><strong><span style="color: #465927;">Gene M</span></strong> is affiliated with the '<span style="color: #465927;"><i>militant</i></span>' phenotype. A budding yeast that is homozygous recessive for <span style="color: #465927;">Gene M</span> colonies are small, dense, and secrete compounds that inhibit the growth of nearby colonies.</li> <li><strong><span style="color: #076cab;">Gene Y</span></strong> is related to the '<span style="color: #076cab;"><i>yolk</i></span>' phenotype. A budding yeast that is homozygous recessive for <span style="color: #076cab;">Gene Y</span> cells develop a dense, yellowish core that resembles an egg yolk when viewed under a microscope.</li> </ul></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; border: 2px solid black; width: 400px; height: 220px;"><tr> <th align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;">Set #</th> <th colspan="4" align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;">Tetrad Genotypes</th> <th align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;">Progeny<br/>Count</th></tr><tr> <td align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;">1</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><div style="padding-left: 5px; padding-right: 5px;"><table style="border-collapse: collapse; border: 0px; padding-left: 50px; padding-right: 50px;"><tr> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #b30000;">+</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #999900;">+</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #002db3;">+</span></td></tr></table></div></span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 1px solid black;"><span style="font-size: medium;"><div style="padding-left: 5px; padding-right: 5px;"><table style="border-collapse: collapse; border: 0px; padding-left: 50px; padding-right: 50px;"><tr> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; padding-right: 5px;"><table style="border-collapse: collapse; border: 0px; padding-left: 50px; padding-right: 50px;"><tr> <td align="center" style="border: 0px; background-color: #ffcccc"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace;">h</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; font-family: monospace; color: #999900;">+</span></td> <td align="center" style="border: 0px;"><span style="font-size: large; NPD &rarr; linked; PD &approx; NPD &rarr; unlinked</li></ul> <li>Step 4: Determine the map distance between the two genes.</li> <ul><li>D = &half; (TT + 6 NPD) / total = (3 NPD + &half; TT) / total</li></ul></ul><h5>Determine the distance between the two genes H and Y</h5>	A. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(1,062) + 3&times;(44)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">5,100</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">531 + 132</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">5,100</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">1,785</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">5,100</td></tr></table> = 0.3500 = <strong>35 cM</strong>	Correct	C. distance = <table style="border-collapse: collapse; display: inline-table; vertical-align: middle;"> <tr><td style="border-bottom: 1px solid black; text-align: center;">&half;(1,062) + 3&times;(44 + 51)</td></tr> <tr><td style="text-align: center;">5,100</td></tr></table> = <table style="border-collapse: collapse;
